title: Black Hole

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
When you land on this space, a Black Hole appears in your wallet. The Black Hole sucks out 250$ from your wallet on your turn until you collect money.
Also, when this property becomes owned, whenever the owner takes a turn, everyone moves a space closer to the black hole, direction depending on if it would be faster to go clockwise or anti-clockwise.
ALSO, when someone with a Black Hole in their wallet takes a turn, everyone except the owner moves a space closer to the black hole, direction again depending if it would be faster to go clockwise or anti-clockwise.

desc:
Post 109
*A black hole is a region of spacetime where gravity is so strong that nothing, including light and other electromagnetic waves, has enough energy to escape it. The theory of general relativity predicts that a sufficiently compact mass can deform spacetime to form a black hole. The boundary of no escape is called the event horizon. Although it has a great effect on the fate and circumstances of an object crossing it, it has no locally detectable features according to general relativity. In many ways, a black hole acts like an ideal black body, as it reflects no light. Moreover (i was gonna include like half of the Black Hole wiki page, but out of room ;-;)
